DOC.brief_title: The Effect Low FODMAP Oral Nutrition Supplement On Breath Hydrogen Response In Healthy Human Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , crossover study require participant arrive lab 12 hour fast , consume oral liquid supplement complete gastrointestinal tolerance questionnaire well produce sample breath hydrogen methane analysis various time point 4 hour time period . Subjects also ask rate gastrointestinal symptom via questionnaire various time point throughout study .
DOC.criteria: Between age 1865 year body mass index 1829 kg/m2 . Demonstrates spoken write English literacy able provide write , informed consent review study protocol procedure . Use enema , proton pump inhibitor , antibiotic within past 3 month Smoker Not regular breakfast eater Selfreported history past current gastrointestinal disease High fiber eater ( > = 3 serving high fiber food per day ) Concurrent recent ( within 30 day ) participation intervention trial Recent weight fluctuation Allergies test product
